title: My Picture - "whilst 'tis so" is best paraphrased

content.question: In the context of the poem, the phrase "whilst 'tis so" (line 1) is best paraphrased as while

choices.label: I am still like the picture

content.answer: I am still like the picture

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
